content.rendered:
FOSS4G conference is the ideal showcase event for new applications, projects, government policies, case studies, business perspectives and training for free and open source geospatial software. We welcome all levels of experience, knowledge, skills, and innovative ideas related to open source geospatial, OpenStreetMap, and Open Data.

Proposals are invited on any FOSS4G-related subject. However the following list may help to provide some guidance on areas likely to be of interest to attendees:

  • FOSS4G in Government, Public Sectors
  • State of Software
  • Use Case and Applications
  • OpenStreetMap and Open Data
  • Education and Training
  • Climate, Environment, Sustainability and Disaster Management
  • Image Processing, Remote Sensing
  • GeoAI and Machine Learning
  • Data Management and Visualization
  • 3D, Digital Twin, Metaverse
  • Lidar, Photogrammetry, Mapping
  • Policies, Businesses

You can submit your abstracts here: https://talks.osgeo.org/foss4g-asia-2023/cfp?track=93-general-tracktalks-online-talks-workshops

General Track Session Type
● Oral Presentation(30 minutes)
● Online Talk(20 minutes)
● Lighting Talk(10 minutes)
● Workshops(4 hours)

Important Date
● Call for Presentation Deadline: Extended to 24th August
● Review Period: 25th August – 1st September
● Decision Announcement: 4th September
● Full Schedule Announcement: 18th September

If you have any inquiries about submitting your talks/abstracts/posters/workshop proposals, please contact FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul team.
